snippet.title: AstroHawk (SNES) - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Get actual SNES cartridge here: https://www.pikointeractive.com/store.html#!/AstroHawk-SNES/p/32184138/category=14008401

Astrohawk is a SNES homebrew developed by Paul Lay from Playsoft. The game was originally developed in the 90's but it was until 2014 when it has been published as a cartridge. Rumors say that companies like Electronic Arts showed interest on the game when it was under development.

Gameplay-wise it is a Free Space Shooter that has some elements of the original Asteroids, and the Bosconian. Select one of 49 areas on the grid to clear, destroy all objects coming in multiple waves there. Use radar to detect your targets.

• 49 sectors to clean
• Multiple weapons
• Space-like interia controls
• Intense action with lots of objects without slowdowns
